description:
This plugin allows you to perform a Fuzzy Search in a dataset or data source.


Please read the documentation (in the plugin), the Bubble Editor and the example at the Service URL:

Editor, documentation, step-by-step and example:
https://bubble.io/page?id=help-comunidadesc&tab=tabs-1&name=fuse-search&type=page

Demo page:
https://help-comunidadesc.bubbleapps.io/version-test/fuse-search?debug_mode=true
name: Fuse Search (Text, Number)
